titleStmt.title: The desires of the countie of Surrey about the late tumult at Westminster. The further proceedings in the county of Kent, and a discovery of the intentions for securing of London Bridge. With a letter from Excester, and the landing of some eminent persons in Cornwall, a rising there, and the forces which are gone to suppresse it.
titleStmt.author: J. T.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B.A. and are to be sold at the Royall Exchange in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: The letter from Excester is signed: J. T.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
